messages.message: cc <!subteam^S07855GV3GV> all tests that require uploading a document and weaviate indexing (eg all build projects) are currently failing on CI due to this issue (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1723582067184569) (essentially file uploads are failing). What should we do? Disable Cypress CI for the time being?

I’m all for unblocking CI because it seems like this issue is a infra issue rather than a code one.

Do you know if we have this issue on the dev crafting sandbox? I wonder if we can temporary switch the backing cluster to the main dev box
this is broken on both `crafting-aihub` and `crafting-cyp` so I’m not sure we can use crafting at all
Got it. Let me look into disabling Crafting CI for now. In the meantime, let’s think aout alternative ideas.

The Cypress test workflow has been disabled (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/workflows/cypress.yml) for the time being, until we fix the Crafting file indexing issue. Existing PRs that are blocked may need to be force merged. Please let <!subteam^S07855GV3GV> know if there’s still issues on your PR.
@Paul H I still can't merge my PR? Is this expected?
yeah it seems that existing PR’s may need to be force merged?
it seems like new PRs also need to be forced merged :thinking_face:
Oof, I guess it’s a required workflow huh
Let me edit the workflow file to always pass and re-enable the runs on PRs.
The alternative is to get someone with admin permission to remove the required check but I think this will be faster.
lots of hoops to jump through! thanks for being so responsive @Paul H!
some cypress on call weeks are harder than others :lolcry:
Okay, Cypress tests have been disabled for realsies now :cat_ok:. Please rebase your PRs on master.
@Paul H could you also post this in <#C06FA6A23|>? i noticed that backend PRs are blocked as well :sweat_smile:
